uk.ac.qmul.sbcs.evolution.convergence.gui.controllers

Class MenuBarController

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.qmul.sbcs.evolution.convergence.gui.controllers.MenuBarController

  • public class MenuBarController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for the menu bar. Uses the globalModel for data, as menu bar only interacts with globals.
    Author:
    Joe Parker, Kitson Consulting / Queen Mary University of London
